hiveArticle.body:
After get grate response from [Giveaway #1](https://steemit.com/steemit/@muarju/1-giveaway-i-will-give-usd1-00-steem-dollars-just-for-upvoting-and-resteeming),  I want to give you guys another giveaway.

I will give it all away to 100 people. $0.02 for each person who Follow me and upvotes & resteems this post + when this post reaches 100 upvotes and resteems i will give a random person $0.40

## This time I will give you guys $0.02 for upvote and resteem this post. 

![2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSXek3RJEBFiBKCpsv6iHGw9zuvHB2fZ1hfqZuPxg8dzu/2.jpg)

If you are my already Follower then you no need to follow me. just upvote and resteem and ocmment done!

Which are Not participate my last giveaway program you can participate now 81 spots left !! : https://steemit.com/steemit/@muarju/1-giveaway-i-will-give-usd1-00-steem-dollars-just-for-upvoting-and-resteeming

I already Paid 19 people for my first giveaway program you can check result: https://steemit.com/giveaway/@muarju/results-giveaway-i-will-give-usd1-00-steem-dollars-just-for-upvoting-and-resteeming

More and more giveaway coming soon. :)
